text: Karaundi (Hindi: करौंदी) is a village in Bikapur tehsil in Faizabad district (now Ayodhya district) in Uttar Pradesh, India. Haiderganj is nearest town from Karaundi, Ayodhya. District headquarters Ayodhya city is 43 km far from Karaundi. Karaundi village is situated on the border of Ayodhya and Ambedkar Nagar district. == References == Category:Villages in Uttar Pradesh
title: Karaundi, Ayodhya
